scripts.postbump: jq -r .version package.json > VERSION && sed -i '' "s/^version = .*$/version = \"$(cat VERSION)\"/" Cargo.toml && rm VERSION && sleep 10 && git add Cargo.toml Cargo.lock CHANGELOG.md examples/tauri-app/src-tauri/Cargo.lock && git commit -m "chore: update version and changelog" && git push
